channel.title: Medicare Range – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: SEERS 2 & 3 Section Bariatric Couches
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
These products meet the increasing requirements for providing examination couches with the capability of supporting extremely heavy patients. All these models have a safe working load and lifting capacity, from minimum height, of 325kgs (51 stone/715lbs).

Medicare Bariatric Couches - Model Choices

SM3573 - Bariatric 3 section couch with retractable wheels SM3673 - Bariatric 3 section couch with large wheel design SM4542 - Bariatric 2 section couch with retractable wheels SM4642 - Bariatric 2 section couch with large wheel design Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard 3 Section Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 325kgs (715lbs=51 stone)
  • Adjustable angle electric backrest from horizontal to +80 degrees positive
  • Adjustable angle head/foot section from -25 to +75 degrees positive
  • The power assisted foot section incorporates anti-trap design gas strut
  • Electric height elevation from 43-97cm (17”-37”)
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Standard width 85cm (33”)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Standard 2 Section Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 325kgs (715lbs=51 stone)
  • Adjustable angle electric backrest operation from horizontal to +80 degrees positive
  • Choice of retractable wheel or large wheel design with steering facility
  • Electric height elevation from 43-97cm (17”-37”) and 45-98cm (18”-38”) on large wheel models
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Standard width 1055cm (41”)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Model 6207 Double foot switch operation
  • Model 6074 Side support rails (each)
  • Model 6074P Side support rail cushions (each)
  • Model 6077 Deluxe memory foam upholstery

item.title: SEERS 2 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very stable and rigid simple 2 section examination couch. This couch will provide much assistance in the reduction of manual handling issues, as well as provide a comfortable surface for the patient to be positioned. With the choice of a retractable wheel or Large Wheel Base design, this product is very versatile in various applications when fitted with optional accessories.

Medicare 2 Section Couch - Model Choices

SM2550 - Hydraulic Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM2560 - Electric Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM2570 - Electric Elevation, electric backrest, Retract Wheel Base Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37 stone)
  • Adjustable head section with positive and negative angle
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 43-97cm (17″-37″)
  • Retractable wheel design with adjustable foot for uneven floors
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Styled Base Shroud

item.title: SEERS 3 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very stable and rigid simple 3 section examination couch. This couch will provide much assistance in the reduction of manual handling issues, as well as provide a comfortable surface for the patient to be positioned. With the choice of a retractable wheel or Large Wheel Base design, this product is very versatile in various applications when fitted with optional accessories.

Medicare 3 Section Couch - Model Choices

SM3550 - Hydraulic Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM3560 - Electric Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM3570 - Electric Elevation, electric backrest, Retract Wheel Base   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37 stone)
  • Adjustable backrest with positive negative angle
  • Adjustable foot section with positive and negative angle
  • The power assisted head and foot sections incorporates anti-trap design
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 43-97cm (17″-37″)
  • Retractable wheel design with adjustable foot for uneven floors
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Styled Base Shroud

For futher details on accessories please call.

item.title: SEERS Bariatric Drop End Couches
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The Bariatric Drop End Couches feature electric independently operated foot sections for effortless positioning for various lower limb procedures. The electric backrest supports the patient in the sitting position. There is a choice of models with either single or dual foot sections, all with a safe working load and lifting capacity of 325Kg (715lbs).   Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Medicare Bariatric Drop End Couches – Model Choices

MODELS

SM3484 Electric height, backrest and dual foot sections – Independently braked castors
SM3684 Electric height, backrest and dual foot sections – Central locking wheel system
SM3483 Electric height, backrest and single foot section – Independently braked castors
SM3683 Electric height, backrest and single foot section – Central locking wheel system

Standard Features
•   Safe working load and lifting capacity of 325Kg (715lbs)
•   Memory foam upholstery (60mm) for additional patient comfort
•   Choice of wheel system designs
•   Adjustable angle electric backrest operation from 0° to +80°
•   Electric foot sections, adjustable in angle from 0° to -90°
•   Electric height elevation from 50cm to 105cm
•   Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
•   Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
•   Hand switch fitted as standard
•   Standard width upholstery 105cm
•   Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Accessories
6004 Breathing hole and plug for prone treatments
6007 Head support cushion
6074 Side support rails (Pair)
6074P Side support rail cushions (Pair)
6005 Paper roll holder

item.title: SEERS Deluxe Gynaecology Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: Designed for colposcopy and general gynaecology procedures, the deluxe models feature electric positioning for height, backrest angle and tilt position. They are supplied with a special set of accessories which include a matching operators chair, base frame shrouding, choice of seat extension, leg supports and matching head cushion, side support loops, debris tray and paper roll holder. Medicare Gynaecology Couches - Model Choices SM8583D - Deluxe Gynaecology Couch with removable extension SM8593D - Deluxe Gynaecology Couch with fold-down extension Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37 stone)
  • Adjustable angle electric backrest from horizontal to +85 degrees positive
  • Electric control of height and tilt angle
  • Excellent height range from 50-102cm (19”-39”)
  • Crescent shaped seat design
  • Fully adjustable patient leg supports
  • Fitted with debris tray, side support loops and paper roll holder
  • Supplied with matching operators chair and head cushion
  • Supplied with choice of removable or fold-down seat extension
  • Compact frame design with retractable wheel system
  • Adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Base frame shrouding fitted as standard
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Standard width 65cm (25”)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Model 6209 Triple foot switch operation
  • Model 6057 Battery back-up facility

For further details on accessories please call

item.title: SEERS Echocardiography Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: Designed specifically for Echocardiography, this couch has electric operation of height, tilt and backrest angle. The backrest has a cut-away design for improved application of the transducer during scanning procedures and a specially designed stool for the clinician is also provided. Medicare Echocardiography Couch - Model Choices SM3590 - Electric with electric tilt and backrest operation Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37.7 stone)
  • Electric adjustment of height, tilt and backrest angle with hand switch control
  • Excellent height range from 50-102cm (19”-39”)
  • Electric backrest angle adjustable from horizontal to +85 degrees positive
  • Electric trendelenberg tilt to 15 degrees
  • Manual adjustment of foot section from negative -25 to +70 degrees positive
  • The foot section incorporates anti-trap design gas strut
  • Backrest design with cut-away for improved transducer positioning
  • Special design stool provided for the clinican
  • Integral footrest for clinician when traditional right hand scanning
  • Handgrip and side support with cushion for patient positioning and security
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Paper roll holder and head support cushion fitted as standard
  • Retractable wheel design with adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Standard width 65cm (25″)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Model 6209 Triple foot switch operation
  • Model 6123 – Fully Adjustable arm support for the clinician

For further details on accessories please call

item.title: SEERS Gynaecology Couches
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The SEERS Gynaecology Couches provides 3 levels of solutions for patient examination and treatment procedures. With choices of electric or hydraulic elevation on the entry models, Electric with Electric Backrest on the mid range, and the top of the range triple motor solution offering Electric height adjustment, Electric Backrest adjustment as well as electric Tilt! Medicare Gynaecology Couches - Model Choices SM8553 - Gynae Couch SM8563 - Gynae Couch, Electric Elevation SM8573 - Gynae Couch, Electric Elevation + Electric Backrest SM8583 - Gynae Couch, Electric Elevation, Electric Tilt & Electric Backrest Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37 stone)
  • Adjustable back rest with positive angle of 0 to 75 degrees
  • Supplied with Arm Loops & Adjustable Leg Supports
  • Choice of models, from single to triple motor variants
  • Excellent height range from 49-104cm (20″-41″)
  • Choice of Retractable wheel design with adjustable foot for uneven floors or Large Wheel Mobile Base Design
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Removable Foot Extension
  • Fold Down Foot Extension
  • Lithotomy Stirrups
  • Upper limb support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Styled Base Shroud

For further details on accessories please call for details

item.title: SEERS Medicare GP Gynaecology Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A multi-purpose couch providing electric positioning for gynaecology procedures, as well as a full length couch surface for most general prone and supine examinations and minor treatment procedures.  

Medicare GP Gynaecology Couches - Model Choices

SM8543 Electric height, tilt and backrest with manual head section, retractable wheel system SM8543D Deluxe Model complete with base cover, matching operators chair and head support cushion, retractable wheel system Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • • Safe working load and lifting capacity of 240Kg (528lbs)
    • Electric adjustable angle backrest from horizontal to +80°
    • Electrically adjustable seat angle with trendelenburg to -10°
    • Power assisted adjustable head section from -25° to +50°
    • Breathing hole and plug fitted
    • Excellent height range from 50cm to 103cm
    • Retractable wheels with adjustable foot for uneven surfaces
    • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
    • Hand switch fitted as standard
    • Supplied complete with lithotomy stirrups and debris tray
    • Standard width upholstery 70cm
    • Paper roll holder fitted as standard
    • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

6053 Protective base frame cover
6057 Battery back-up facility
6045 Gynaecology leg supports
6007 Head support cushion
6209 Triple foot switch
6100 Matching operators chair

For further details on accessories please call for details

item.title: SEERS Mobile 2 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very strong and rigid mobile treatment couch supplied with side support rails and paper towel holder. The large wheel system incorporates a steering facility and the couch has an excellent height range with low patient transfer height of just 46cm.

Medicare Mobile 2 Section Couch - Model Choices

SM2650 - Hydraulic Elevation, Large Wheel Design SM2660 - Electric Elevation, Large Wheel Design Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37 stone)
  • Adjustable foot section with positive and negative angle
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Choice of Manual or electric backrest
  • Excellent height range from 43-97cm (17″-37″)
  • Large Wheel Mobile Base Design for easy movement
  • Paper towel holder fitted as standard
  • Fitted fold up/down Side support rails
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Foot switch operation for electric models
  • Cushions for Side Rails
  • Upper limb support
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Styled Base Shroud

For further details on accessories please call

item.title: SEERS Mobile 3 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very durable 3 section mobile examination couch. This couch will provide much assistance in the reduction of manual handling issues, as well as provide a comfortable surface for the patient to be positioned. With the Large Wheel Base design, this product is very versatile in various applications when fitted with optional accessories and has the benefit to be easily transferred into different locations around the hospital.

Medicare Mobile 3 Section Couch - Model Choices

SM3650 - Hydraulic Elevation, Large Wheel Design SM3660 - Electric Elevation, Large Wheel Design Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37 stone)
  • Adjustable foot section with positive and negative angle
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Choice of Manual or electric backrest
  • Excellent height range from 43-97cm (17″-37″)
  • Large Wheel Mobile Base Design for easy movement
  • Paper towel holder fitted as standard
  • Fitted fold up/down Side support rails
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Foot switch operation for electric models
  • Cushions for Side Rails
  • Upper limb support
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Styled Base Shroud

For further details on accessories please call
